name: Caliban Below
description: A short interactive story for room-scale VR: Become Caliban, the scion of a broken lineage struggling to understand your dark inheritance. Explore the ruins of the family estate, and the incredible realm below seeking clues to your past, and to the events that severed you from your family long ago.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: windows 7, 8, 10 Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Memory: 8 GB RAM Storage: 4 GB available space
